text: “Ndipo akauzidwa (Ayuda): “Khulupirirani zimene Allah wavumbulutsa (kwa mtumiki Muhammad {s.a.w}).” Amanena: “Tikukhulupirira zimene zidavumbulitsidwa kwa ife,” ndipo amazikana zomwe sizili zimenezo ngakhale izo zili zoona, zomwe zikutsimikizira pa zimene ali nazo pamodzi. Nena: “Nanga bwanji mudapha aneneri a Allah kalelo ngati muli okhulupiriradi?”
